original_title: Magnificent Machines: The Golden Age of the British Sports Car
overview: From the MG Midget, much loved by American GIs, through to the more affordable Austin Healey 'frog-eye' Sprite and the E-Type Jaguar, seen by many as the ultimate sports car, this is a tale of how, for a brief time, Britain was home to two-seater heaven.
title: Magnificent Machines: The Golden Age of the British Sports Car
